Effect of Too Much Preaching. 

     There is another point I want to speak about: it is about the preaching at our camp-meetings. There is twice the amount of preaching at our camp-meetings that there ought to be. Many smaller matters that lead to things of greater importance, are utterly neglected. The idea seems to be only to preach. And the ministers 


                    -36- 

are so tired that when it comes to looking after the little points that need to be guarded.--which points would close the door to larger evils.--they have no vitality, no time to meditate and pray, and keep themselves in the love of God during the meetings.
